channel.title: Can i still make a server without going into my router?
channel.description: I dont know pass of router is there a way to get a server without going in router???[br][size=1]Posted on: January 28, 2007, 07:12:03 AM[/size][hr]cmon some one can say yes or no :P

item.title: Can i still make a server without going into my router?

item.description:

hmm i dont really get it…

  • I maked a new server with my pass
    And where can i advertise then??[br][size=1]Posted on: January 28, 2007, 07:31:17 AM[/size][hr]aww, how can it be online then?

item.title: Can i still make a server without going into my router?
item.dc:creator: @ralazo ralazo
item.description:
@ralazo wrote:

use hamachi. download it at http://www.hamachi.cc
than create network whit youre pass and network name than go to server advertisment on moparscape and give youre ip look on hamachi above ther is a ip
that ip most use people that wanna connect hamachi servers in moparscape like username: youre username Pass: youre pass
here ip: the ip what is above on hamachi

than create network whit youre pass and network name than go to server advertisment on moparscape and give youre ip look on hamachi above ther is a ip
that ip most use people that wanna connect hamachi servers in moparscape like username: youre username Pass: youre pass
here ip: the ip what is above on youre hamachi
